name: Sheep Meta
declaringWar: Baask in my glory - for it is one you will have to get used to.
defeated: Baah, you baarely did anything... shear luck must have been on your side..
attacked: What's that? Wolves dare come near me? How baamusing.
introduction: You are in the presence of Attila, scourge of Rome. Do not let hubris be your downfall as well.
neutralHello: Baa, Baa (You must be blessed to even talk to Sheep)
tradeRequest: This is better than you deserve, but let it not be said that I am an unfair man.

name: Las Ovejas
declaringWar: Los Ovinos will not allow your presence in our fields. Al ataquee!
defeated: Noo, por qué corruption plagues us like mites?
attacked: The gambesons are ready. La mejor calidad.
introduction: Buenos días. Yo am El Caballero, noble leader of this small confeederation. May not menace us, instead be part of our herd.
tradeRequest: May we cooperate in the affairs that involves us in such thicc whool.

name: Absolute Sheeple
declaringWar: Do not resist. Or do, it might be more fun that way.
defeated: Nooo!! If I'm gone, who will tell the Sheeple what to think and how to feel?
attacked: Ohoho, now things are getting interesting. A shame I didn't strike first.
introduction: Greetings, Free Thinker. Let's see if you can stay that way.
neutralHello: What brings you to Dune's Estate today?
hateHello: Another one with wool still covering their eyes... what do you want?
tradeRequest: My Sheeple have riches to spare. Care to make a deal?
uniques: Resting point for Influence with City-States is increased by [20] <while the empire is happy>

name: Welsheep
declaringWar: I grow tired of this throne. I think I should like to have yours instead.
defeated: My people will mourn me not with tears, but with human blood.
attacked: Now what is this?! You ask me to add your riches to my great avails. The invitation is accepted.
introduction: You are in the presence of Attila, scourge of Rome. Do not let hubris be your downfall as well.
neutralHello: Baa, Baa (You must be blessed to even talk to Sheep)
tradeRequest: This is better than you deserve, but let it not be said that I am an unfair man.

name: Las Cabras
declaringWar: I came, I saw, I conquered.
defeated: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
attacked: Have you ever heard the phrase 'Never interrupt your enemy when he is making a mistake', I though so.
introduction: It seems you have finally found us, we are the goats, the shepherds, And I hope you remember that.
uniqueText:
Gain free beliefs for completing Policy Trees
			+1 Faith from every Sheep
			Units ignore terrain costs when moving into any tile with Hills
uniques: Units ignore terrain costs when moving into any tile with Hills
